preconditions.precondition: The Level 4 projections producer needs aggregated time series of air temperature, gridded historical weather observations, and climate model data.

mainSequence.step: Level 4 projections producer asks the Level 2/3/4 data producer for aggregated time series of air temperature.
Level 4 projections producer asks the Level 2/3/4 data producer for gridded historical weather observations.
Level 4 projections producer asks the Level 2/3/4 data producer for climate model data.
Level 2/3/4 data producer retrieves URIs from the Level 2/3/4 data.
Level 2/3/4 data producer provides the retrieved URIs to the Level 4 projections producer.
